Title: Kax.WebControls.RadioButtonList
Description: Web Custom Control that extend RadioButtonList to allow uncheckable state.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Web Custom Control that extend RadioButtonList to allow uncheckable state.


** Information **

Web Custom Control project (VS2005 - C#).
By switch the "Required" property you change the behavior :
  • 1. True : it's the default RadioButtonList behavior
  • 2. False :
    • None option preselected
    • You can uncheck an option already checked
